quotes.message: Try not to associate bodily defect with mental, my good friend, except for a solid reason.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: One always overcompensates for disabilities. I'm thinking of having my entire body surgically removed.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: My disability has opened my eyes to see my true abilities.
quotes.name: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.message: My ability is greater than my disability.
quotes.name: Nikki Rowe

quotes.message: We know that equality of individual ability has never existed and never will, but we do insist that equality of opportunity still must be sought.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: No pessimist ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new doorway for the human spirit.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: We think we know what it's all about; we think that disability is a really simple thing, and we don't expect to see disabled people in our daily lives.
quotes.name: Stella Young

quotes.message: I think that everyone has something about themselves that they feel is their weakness their disability. And I'm certain we all have one, because I think of a disability as being anything which undermines our belief and confidence in our own abilities.
quotes.name: Aimee Mullins

quotes.message: Disability doesn't make you exceptional, but questioning what you think you know about it does.
quotes.name: Stella Young

quotes.message: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
quotes.name: Sharron Angle

quotes.message: People presume my disability has to do with being an amputee, but that's not the case; our insecurities are our disabilities, and I struggle with those as does everyone.
quotes.name: Aimee Mullins

quotes.message: Disability is natural. We must stop believing that disabilities keep a person from doing something. Because that's not true. Having a disability doesn't stop me from doing anything.
quotes.name: Benjamin Snow

quotes.message: Every person with a disability is an individual.
quotes.name: Itzhak Perlman

quotes.message: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The world worries about disability more than disabled people do.
quotes.name: Warwick Davis

quotes.message: Each handicap is like a hurdle in a steeplechase, and when you ride up to it, if you throw your heart over, the horse will go along, too.
quotes.name: Lawrence Bixby

quotes.message: I have not been handicapped by my condition. I am physically challenged and differently able.
quotes.name: Janet Barnes

quotes.message: Dancing with a spinal cord injury is a challenge like no other, but I aspired to prove to myself that I could still be phenomenal dancer even with an SCI.
quotes.name: Sarah Todd Hammer

quotes.message: If we are to achieve a richer culture, we must weave one in which each diverse human gift will find a fitting place.
quotes.name: Margaret Meade

quotes.message: Enable the disabled; Translate disability into ability; Capability, a winning opportunity indeed a reality.
quotes.name: Dr. Veena Kumari

quotes.message: The strong, ferocious wind just made the chill worse, and as it blew around me, electric bursts of pain shot through my body.
quotes.name: Jennifer Starzec

quotes.message: For me, disability is a way of getting some extremity, some kind of very difficult situation, that throws an interesting light on people.
quotes.name: Mark Haddon

quotes.message: I was diagnosed with a severe temporal spatial deficit, a learning disability that means I have zero spatial relations skills. It was official: I was a genius trapped in an idiot's body.
quotes.name: Sloane Crosley

quotes.message: Know me for my abilities, not my disability.
quotes.name: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.message: Being disabled should not mean being disqualified from having access to every aspect of life.
quotes.name: Emma Thompson

quotes.message: Life is all about balance. Since I have only one leg, I understand that well.
quotes.name: Sandy Fussell

quotes.message: My advice to other disabled people would be, concentrate on things your disability doesn't prevent you doing well, and don't regret the things it interferes with. Don't be disabled in spirit as well as physically.
quotes.name: Stephen Hawking

quotes.message: It is a waste of time to be angry about my disability. One has to get on with life and I haven't done badly. People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
quotes.name: Stephen Hawking

quotes.message: I have a Disability yes that's true, but all that really means is I may have to take a slightly different path than you.
quotes.name: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.message: Abled does not mean enabled. Disabled does not mean less abled.
quotes.name: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.message: I choose not to place DIS, in my ability.
quotes.name: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.message: Some disabled people spend a significant amount of their energy on trying to come across as abled or as not that disabled.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Being disabled does not mean Un-abled, just Different Abled.
quotes.name: Noel Helm

quotes.message: When you have a disability, knowing that you are not defined by it is the sweetest feeling.
quotes.name: Anne Wafula Strike

quotes.message: Just because a man lacks the use of his eyes doesn't mean he lacks vision.
quotes.name: Stevie Wonder

quotes.message: There are two kinds of disabled persons: Those who dwell on what they have lost and those who concentrate on what they have left.
quotes.name: Thomas Szasz

quotes.message: Being unconscious is the ultimate disability.
quotes.name: Jessa Gamble

quotes.message: I'm officially disabled, but I'm truly enabled because of my lack of limbs. My unique challenges have opened up unique opportunities to reach so many in need.
quotes.name: Nick Vujicic

quotes.message: A child is only as disabled as their environment and the beliefs of the people around them.
quotes.name: Bala Pillai

quotes.message: Disability has become a form of permanent welfare for a lot of folks. It's not that hard to prove a mental illness or mental issues or pain issues.
quotes.name: Nina Easton

quotes.message: What I learned was that these athletes were not disabled, they were superabled. The Olympics is where heroes are made. The Paralympics is where heroes come.
quotes.name: Joey Reiman

quotes.message: Disability is a matter of perception. If you can do just one thing well, you're needed by someone.
quotes.name: Martina Navratilova

quotes.message: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
quotes.name: Christopher Reeves

quotes.message: Disability is often framed, in medical terms, as the ultimate disaster and certainly as a deficit.
quotes.name: Stella Young

quotes.message: For me, the wheelchair symbolizes disability in a way a cane does not.
quotes.name: Annette Funicello
